title: Authorizes the city of Yonkers to discontinue the use of certain city lands as parkland and to sell and convey such lands
summary: Authorizes the city of Yonkers to discontinue the use of certain city lands as parkland and to sell and convey such lands.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2689

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. PRETLOW, SPANO -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Cities

       AN ACT to authorize the  city  of  Yonkers,  county  of  Westchester  to
         discontinue  the use of certain city lands as parkland and to sell and
         convey such lands

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1.  The city of Yonkers, Westchester county, is hereby author-
    2  ized to discontinue as parklands and alienate, sell and convey the lands
    3  described  in  section three of this act and in exchange therefor, dedi-
    4  cate as parklands the lands described in section four of this act,  such
    5  land to be used for park purposes.
    6    S  2.  Notwithstanding  the  failure of the city of Yonkers to seek or
    7  receive state legislative authorization to alienate certain of the park-
    8  lands described in section three of this act and used for  public  park-
    9  ing, such use is validated, ratified and confirmed.
   10    S 3. The lands to be discontinued as parklands and alienated, sold and
   11  conveyed are described as follows:
   12    Parcel 1. All that certain piece or parcel of land located in the city
   13  of Yonkers, Westchester County, more particularly described as follows:
   14  BEGINNING  AT  A  POINT,  SAID  POINT  BEING DISTANT 47.69 FEET FROM THE
   15  INTERSECTION OF THE SOUTHWESTERLY BOUNDARY OF NEW MAIN  STREET  AND  THE
   16  NORTHEASTERLY  BOUNDARY  OF  NEPPERHAN  AVENUE; RUNNING THENCE ALONE THE
   17  NORTHERLY BOUNDARY OF NEPPERHAN AVENUE ON A CURVE TO THE RIGHT HAVING  A
   18  RADIUS  OF  526.00 FEET AND AN ARC LENGTH OF 105.34 FEET TO A POINT; AND
   19  THENCE S 74µ23'40" W A DISTANCE OF 138.10 FEET TO A POINT;  AND  RUNNING
   20  THENCE  N  14µ57'34"  W A DISTANCE OF 58.07 FEET TO A POINT; AND RUNNING
   21  THENCE ON A CURVE TO THE RIGHT HAVING A RADIUS OF 105.00 FEET AND AN ARC
   22  LENGTH OF 40.40 FEET; AND RUNNING THENCE ON A CURVE TO THE LEFT HAVING A
   23  RADIUS OF 150.00 FEET AND AN ARC LENGTH OF 114.89 FEET TO A  POINT;  AND
   24  RUNNING  THENCE N 36µ47"49' W A DISTANCE OF 238.24 FEET TO A POINT;  AND

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03047-01-1

       A. 2689                             2

    2  RUNNING  THENCE  S  48µ48'47" E A DISTANCE OF 85.36 FEET TO A POINT; AND

   42  POINT AND PLACE OF BEGINNING.
   43  Parcel  3:  All that certain piece or parcel of land located in the City
   44  of Yonkers, Westchester County, more particularly described as follows:
   45  BEGINNING AT A POINT OF INTERSECTION FORMED BY THE LINE DIVIDING LOTS 20

   52  ALONG  SAID  NORTHWESTERLY  LINE  OF GUION STREET, SOUTH 04 DEGREES - 15

   56  POINT, THENCE;

   17  Parcel 4: All that certain piece or parcel of land located in  the  City
   18  of Yonkers, Westchester County, more particularly described as follows:

   23  PALISADE AVENUE (FORMERLY KNOWN AS FACTORY  STREET)  AS  ESTABLISHED  BY
   24  "MAP OF SURVEY OF PROPERTY NO. 8 PALISADE AVENUE AND SE COR. OF NEW MAIN

   26  ING, DATED OCTOBER 27, 1937, LAST UPDATED AUGUST 29, 1938 ON FILE AT THE
   27  OFFICE OF THE TITLE GUARANTEE AND TRUST COMPANY AS TITLE NOS.  6-001012,
   28  6-002540,   6-002693  AND  6-002941,  FROM  ITS  INTERSECTION  WITH  THE
   29  NORTHEASTERLY LINE OF  NEW  MAIN  STREET  (FORMERLY  KNOWN  AS  MECHANIC
   30  STREET)  AS  ESTABLISHED  BY "SURVEY OF PROPERTY SITUATED IN THE CITY OF
   31  YONKERS" PREPARED BY CHAS. J. DEARING, DATED NOVEMBER 12, 1948  ON  FILE

   35  4,  1948  ON FILE AT THE OFFICE OF THE TITLE GUARANTEE AND TRUST COMPANY
   36  AS TITLE NO. 6-024537, TO THE INTERSECTION OF THE AFOREMENTIONED  SOUTH-
   37  EASTERLY  LINE  OF  PALISADE AVENUE WITH THE SOUTHWESTERLY LINE OF JAMES

   39  EAST,  A  DISTANCE  OF 34.84 FEET, THENCE ALONG A LINE PARALLEL WITH THE
   40  PRESENT NORTHEASTERLY LINE OF JAMES  STREET,  SOUTH  35µ45'08"  EAST,  A
   41  DISTANCE OF 129.96 FEET TO THE INTERSECTION OF THE SOUTHEASTERLY LINE OF
   42  ENGINE PLACE WITH THE NORTHEASTERLY LINE OF JAMES STREET AS SHOWN ON THE
   43  OFFICIAL  TAX MAP OF THE CITY OF YONKERS AS SAID TAX MAP WAS ON DECEMBER
   44  16, 1936, CONTINUING FROM SAID POINT OF BEGINNING:
   45    ALONG THE AFOREMENTIONED SOUTHEASTERLY LINE OF ENGINE PLACE,
   46  THENCE NORTH 70µ56'38" EAST, A DISTANCE OF 157.00 FEET,
   47    THENCE SOUTH 19µ03'22" EAST, A DISTANCE OF 81.00 FEET TO THE NORTHWES-
   48  TERLY LINE OF JOHN STREET,
   49    ALONG THE AFOREMENTIONED NORTHWESTERLY LINE OF JOHN STREET,
   50    THENCE SOUTH 70µ56'38" WEST, A DISTANCE OF 132.70 FEET TO  THE  AFORE-
   51  MENTIONED  NORTHEASTERLY  LINE  OF JAMES STREET AS SHOWN ON THE OFFICIAL
   52  TAX MAP OF THE CITY OF YONKERS AS SAID TAX MAP WAS ON DECEMBER 16, 1936,
   53    ALONG THE AFOREMENTIONED NORTHEASTERLY LINE OF JAMES STREET  AS  SHOWN
   54  ON  THE  OFFICIAL  TAX MAP OF THE CITY OF YONKERS AS SAID TAX MAP WAS ON
   55  DECEMBER 16, 1936,

       A. 2689                             4

    1    THENCE NORTH 35µ45'08" WEST, A DISTANCE OF 84.57 FEET TO THE POINT  OR
    2  PLACE OF BEGINNING.
    3  Containing in all 2.93 acres more or less.
    4  Subject to easements, covenants and restriction of record.
    5    S  4.  The replacement lands to be dedicated by the city of Yonkers to
    6  use as parkland for public park purposes are  located  in  the  city  of
    7  Yonkers,  Westchester county comprise a total of 8.25 acres more or less
    8  and particularly described as follows:
    9  Parcel 1. All that certain piece or parcel of land located in  the  City
   10  of Yonkers, Westchester County, at 101 Odell Avenue, Block 3515, Lot 100
   11  and being more particularly bounded and described as follows:
   12    BEGINNING  at  a point on the easterly side of Odell Avenue a distance
   13  of 1,244.40 feet northerly as measured along the northerly and  easterly
   14  sides  of  Odell  Avenue  from the intersection of the northerly side of
   15  Odell Avenue with the westerly side of North Broadway
   16    THENCE from said point of beginning the following two (2) courses  and
   17  distances along the easterly and northerly side of Odell Avenue:
   18  1.  North  00    degrees 15 minutes 30 seconds East a distance of 100.00
   19  feet to a point;
   20  2. South 89 degrees 34 minutes 00 seconds West a distance of 50.00  feet
   21  to a point on the easterly side of the Croton Aqueduct;
   22    Thence  the following two (2) courses and distances along the easterly
   23  side of the Croton Aqueduct:
   24  1. North 00 degrees 26 minutes 00 seconds West a distance of 427.16 feet
   25  to a point;
   26  2. Along the arc of curve to the right having a radius of 460.00 feet an
   27  arc length of 91.51 feet to a point on the southerly side of land now or
   28  formerly of the County of Westchester;
   29    thence along the southerly side of land now or formerly of the  County
   30  of Westchester South 73 degrees 05 minutes 00 seconds East a distance of
   31  399.63  feet  to  a point; thence South 29 degrees 31 minutes 20 seconds
   32  West a distance of 454.11 feet to a point; thence South  11  degrees  41
   33  minutes  57  seconds  West  a  distance of 96.72 feet to a point; thence
   34  South 92 degrees 56 minutes 51 seconds West a distance of 94.37 feet  to
   35  the easterly side of Odell Avenue and the point of beginning.
   36  Described parcel contains an area of 143,165.01 square feet or 3.3 acres
   37  more or less.
   38    Parcel 2: All that certain piece or parcel of land located in the City
   39  of  Yonkers,  Westchester  County, located at 1061 North Broadway, Block
   40  3515, Lot 115 and being  more  particularly  bounded  and  described  as
   41  follows:
   42    BEGINNING at a point where the westerly side of North Broadway (Rt. 9)
   43  intersects the northerly side of Odell Avenue;
   44    THENCE  from said point of beginning the following six (6) courses and
   45  distances along the northerly and easterly side of Odell Avenue:
   46    1. South 87 degrees 31 minutes 00 seconds West a  distance  of  170.59
   47  feet to a point;
   48    2. Along the arc of a curve to the right having a radius of 75.00 feet
   49  an arc length of 46.05 feet to a point;
   50    3.  North  57  degrees 18 minutes 00 seconds West a distance of 197.22
   51  feet to a point;
   52    4. Along the arc of a curve to the right having a radius of 75.00 feet
   53  an arc length of 88.75 feet to a point;
   54    5. North 10 degrees 29 minutes 52 seconds East a  distance  of  340.46
   55  feet to a point;

       A. 2689                             5

    1    6.  North  00  degrees 15 minutes 30 seconds East a distance of 401.33
    2  feet to a point;
    3    thence North 82 degrees 56 minutes 51 seconds East a distance of 94.37
    4  feet  to  a  point; thence South 16 degrees 26 minutes 04 seconds East a
    5  distance of 319.07 feet to a point;
    6    thence South 00 degrees 25 minutes  39  seconds  East  a  distance  of
    7  350.00  feet  to  a point; thence South 68 degrees 44 minutes 52 seconds
    8  East a distance of 256.00 feet to a point on the westerly side of  North
    9  Broadway;
   10    thence  along  the westerly side of North Broadway South 21 degrees 05
   11  minutes 18 seconds West a distance of 200.00 feet to the northerly  side
   12  of Odell Avenue and the point of beginning.
   13  Described  parcel  contains  an  area  of 215,463.48 square feet or 4.95
   14  acres more or less.
   15    S 5. In the event that the replacement city parklands to be  dedicated
   16  in section four of this act are not equal to twice the size of the lands
   17  to  be  alienated  in  section three of this act, or are not equal to or
   18  greater than the fair market value of  the  lands  to  be  alienated  in
   19  section three of this act, the city of Yonkers shall dedicate additional
   20  city-owned  lands  for  parkland and/or cause funds to be made available
   21  for capital improvements to its existing park and  recreational  facili-
   22  ties, as necessary, to equal such fair market value.
   23    S  6.  The discontinuance and conveyance of parkland authorized by the
   24  provisions of this act shall not occur until the  city  of  Yonkers  has
   25  complied  with  any federal requirements pertaining to the alienation or
   26  conversion of parklands, including satisfying the Secretary of the Inte-
   27  rior that the conversion complies with all conditions which  the  Secre-
   28  tary of the Interior deems necessary to assure the substitution of other
   29  lands  shall be equivalent in fair market value and recreational useful-
   30  ness to the lands being alienated or converted.
   31    S 7. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to authorize the city of Yonkers, county of Westchester to discontinue the use of certain city lands as parkland and to sell and convey such lands
